data_table.description: Medical History Questionnaire, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: MHQA1A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you had arthritis? Q1A [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA1C
variable.description: Which type of arthritis was it? Q1C [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA2A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you had hay fever? Q2A [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA2B
variable.description: Do you still have hay fever? Q2B [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA3A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you had cataracts? Q3A [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA4A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you had goiter or other thyroid disease? Q4A [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA4C
variable.description: Do you still have goiter or other thyroid disease? Q4C [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA5A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you had lupus? Q5A [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA6A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you had gout? Q6A [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA7A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you had stomach or duodenal ulcer? Q7A [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA7C
variable.description: Do you still have stomach or duodenal ulcer? Q7C [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA8
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you had adenoma or polyp of the colon (large intestine)? Q8 [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA9A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you had a blood clot in a leg (deep vein thrombosis)? This does not include varicose veins or phlebitis. Q9A [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA10A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you had a blood clot in your lungs (pulmonary embolus)? Q10A [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA11A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you had Parkinson's disease? Q11A [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA12A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you had gallstones? Q12A [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA12B
variable.description: Have you ever had medical treatment to dissolve or remove gallstones? Do not include surgery. Q12B [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA13A
variable.description: Have you ever had gallbladder surgery? Q13A [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA14A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you had broken or fractured your hip? Q14A [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA15A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you had broken or fractured your wrist? Q15A [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA16A
variable.description: Has a doctor ever told you that you had broken or fractured your spine? Q16A [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA17A
variable.description: Have you ever had pain in your hands? This also includes aching and stiffness. Q17A [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA17B
variable.description: Has this pain been present on most days for at least 6 weeks? Q17B [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA18A
variable.description: Have you ever had swelling in your hand that hurt when the joint was touched? Q18A [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA18B
variable.description: Has this swelling been present on most days for at least 6 weeks? Q18B [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA19A
variable.description: Have you ever had stiffness in your hands when first getting out of bed in the morning? Q19A [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA19B
variable.description: Has this stiffness been present on most days for at least 6 weeks? Q19B [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA19C
variable.description: How long after getting up and moving around does the morning stiffness last? Q19C [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA20A
variable.description: Have you ever had pain in your knees? This also includes aching and stiffness? Q20A [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA20B
variable.description: Has this pain been present on most days for at least 6 weeks? Q20B [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA21A
variable.description: Have you ever had swelling in your knees that hurt when the joint was touched? Q21A [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA21B
variable.description: Has this swelling been present on most days for at least 6 weeks? Q21B [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA22A
variable.description: Have you ever had stiffness in your knees when first getting out of bed in the morning? Q22A [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA22B
variable.description: Has this stiffness been present on most days for at least 6 weeks? Q22B [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA23A
variable.description: Have you ever had pain in your hips? Q23A [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA23B
variable.description: Has this pain been present on most days for at least 6 weeks? Q23B [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA24
variable.description: How many times at night do you usually get up to urinate (pass water)? Q24 [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA25
variable.description: If you are a man, please answer items 25 and 26. Has the force of your urinary stream or water decreased over the years? Q25 [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA26
variable.description: If you are a man, please answer items 25 and 26. Have you ever had surgery for your prostate, not related to cancer? Q26 [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA28
variable.description: Method of administration. Q28 [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA29
variable.description: Code number. Q29 [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA1B
variable.description: How old were you when you were first told you had arthritis? Q1B [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA3B
variable.description: How old were you when you were first told you had cataracts? Q3B [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA4B
variable.description: How old were you when you were first told you had goiter or other thyroid disease? Q4B [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA5B
variable.description: How old were you when you were first told you had lupus? Q5B [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA6B
variable.description: How old were you when you were first told you had gout? Q6B [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA7B
variable.description: How old were you when you were first told you had stomach or duodenal ulcer? Q7B [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA9B
variable.description: How old were you when you were first told you had a blood clot in a leg? Q9B [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA10B
variable.description: How old were you when you were first told you had a blood clot in your lungs? Q10B [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA11B
variable.description: How old were you when you were first told you had Parkinson's disease? Q11B [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA13B
variable.description: How old were you when you had gallbladder surgery? Q13B [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA14B
variable.description: About how old were you when you fractured your hip for the first time? Q14B [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA15B
variable.description: About how old were you when you fractured your wrist for the first time? Q15B [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQA16B
variable.description: About how old were you when you fractured your spine for the first time? Q16B [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQAFLAG
variable.description: Indicator for presence of form [Medical History Questionnaire] [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: MHQACY
variable.description: Contact year [10] [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Medical History Questionnaire, exam 4]
